pli-tv-pvr2.6:5.1: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr2.6:5.2: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ—
pli-tv-pvr2.6:6.1: Dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr2.6:6.2: Dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ—
